text: ohe yara imana enecha! Yakhana tomara kono gopana paramarsa-sabha pato takhana tomara paramarsa karo na papacarana o satruta o rasulera prati abadhyatara jan'ya, baram tomara paramarsa karo satkarmera o dharmabhirutara jan'ye, ara allahâ€Œke bhaya-bhakti karo yamra kache tomadera ekatrita kara habe.
